item.title: Friendships
item.description: http://waitbutwhy.com/2014/12/10-types-odd-friendships-youre-probably-part.html So, I needed to get educated about my friendships. This relaxed me a bit. Note: This is an archived post from my unmaintained Tumblr blog https://k4rtik.tumblr.com
